country_event = { #Catholic uprising
	
	id = dg_turmoil.001
	title = dg_turmoil.001.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.001.d
	picture = turmoil_holy_war
	
	trigger = {
		at_war_with_religious_enemy = yes #Simplest triggers first
		any_owned_province = { can_spawn_rebels = catholic_rebels }
		war_exhaustion = 2
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_uprising_catholic }
		OR = { #a hard-fought war
			war_exhaustion = 10
			NOT = { manpower_percentage = 0.25 }
			any_owned_province = { NOT = { controlled_by = ROOT } }
			capital_scope = { has_siege = yes }
		}
		any_known_country = {
			war_with = ROOT
			religion_group = christian
		}
		NOT = { religion = catholic }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 8
		
		modifier = {
			catholic = 2
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			catholic = 1
			factor = 2
		}
		modifier = {
			any_known_country = {
				war_with = ROOT
				religion = catholic
				is_defender_of_faith = yes
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			any_known_country = {
				war_with = ROOT
				religion = catholic
			}
			factor = 0.7
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		set_country_flag = religious_uprising
		set_country_flag = religious_uprising_catholic
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.001.c #We shall remember this
		if = {
			limit = { catholic = 1 }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { can_spawn_rebels = catholic_rebels }
				add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 365 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { catholic = -1 }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { can_spawn_rebels = catholic_rebels }
				add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { catholic = -3 }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { can_spawn_rebels = catholic_rebels }
				add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 1095 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { can_spawn_rebels = catholic_rebels }
				add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 1460 }
			}
		}
	}
}

			NOT = { manpower_percentage = 0.25 }

		}

		}

		}

			}

		}
		modifier = {

country_event = { #Emergency Tithe
	
	id = dg_turmoil.031
	title = dg_turmoil.031.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.031.d
	picture = all_church_submission
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
		had_country_flag = { flag = religious_turmoil_happening days = 180 }
		any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics }
		NOT = { num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1 }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = emergency_tithe_offered }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 12 }
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = emergency_tithe_offered
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = dg_wealth_estimate	value = 0 }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics
				}
				set_variable = { which = dg_population_tithing	value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = dg_wealth_estimate_rural	value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = dg_wealth_estimate_urban	value = 0 }

					limit = {
						owner = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_heretics }

# Wars of Religion # 40s

country_event = { #War of Religion (against heretics)
	
	id = dg_turmoil.041
	title = dg_turmoil.041.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.041.d
	picture = turmoil_holy_war
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		hidden_effect = {
			#AFFECTS AI DECISIONS
			set_country_flag = war_of_religion_fought
			#SET THE STRENGTH OF THE REBEL SIDE
			every_owned_province = {
				set_variable = { which = religious_uprising value = 0 }
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					is_colony = no
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = catholic
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = protestant
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = reformed
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = orthodox
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = coptic
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = chaldean
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = gnostic
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = hussite
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = sunni
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = shiite
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = ibadi
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = wahhabi
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = hinduism
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = sikhism
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = jain
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = zoroastrian
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = adi_dharam
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = buddhism
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = shinto
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = mahayana
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = confucianism
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = vajrayana
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = jewish
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = shamanism
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = animism
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = hellenic_pagan
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = polynesian_religion
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = norse_pagan_reformed
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = pantheism
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = totemism
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = nahuatl
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = mesoamerican_religion
				}
				dg_check_religious_turmoil = {
					religion = inti
				}
				#To avoid wars of religion ending due to forts reconquering them
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { fort_level = 1 } }
					multiply_variable = { which = religious_uprising value = 0.5 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { any_neighbor_province = { owned_by = ROOT fort_level = 1 } }
					multiply_variable = { which = religious_uprising value = 0.5 }
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					all_province = {
						OR = {
							NOT = { owned_by = ROOT }
							NOT = { area = prev }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = religious_uprising which = prev } }
							is_variable_equal = { which = religious_uprising which = prev }
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = this_one
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_province = {
							area = PREV
							NOT = { province_id = PREV }
							has_province_flag = this_one
						}
					}
					random_province = {
						limit = { area = PREV has_province_flag = this_one }
						clr_province_flag = this_one
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						any_province = {
							area = PREV
							NOT = { province_id = PREV }
							has_province_flag = this_one
						}
					}
					random_province = {
						limit = { area = PREV has_province_flag = this_one }
						clr_province_flag = this_one
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_province_flag = this_one } }
				set_variable = { which = religious_uprising value = 0 }
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = this_one }
				clr_province_flag = this_one
			}

							spawn_rebels = { type = totemism_rebels size = 1 win = yes }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = { has_province_flag = heretic_bastion }
								is_city = yes
								is_core = ROOT
								check_variable = { which = totemism value = 4 }
							}
							spawn_rebels = { type = totemism_rebels size = 0 }
						}
					}
				}
				nahuatl = {
					every_owned_province = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = church_bastion
							}
							spawn_rebels = { type = nahuatl_rebels size = 1 win = yes }
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = { has_province_flag = heretic_bastion }
								is_city = yes
								is_core = ROOT
								check_variable = { which = nahuatl value = 4 }
							}
							spawn_rebels = { type = nahuatl_rebels size = 0 }
						}
					}
				}
				mesoamerican_religion = {
					every_owned_province = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = church_bastion
							}
							spawn_rebels = { type = mesoamerican_religion_rebels size = 1 win = yes }
						}
						else_if = {

					}

							}
							spawn_rebels = { type = inti_rebels size = 0 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#End hidden effect
		kill_ruler = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = rebel_conversion }
			subtract_stability_3 = yes
			clr_country_flag = rebel_conversion
		}
		else = {
			subtract_stability_5 = yes

province_event = { #Heretic bastion falls
	
	id = dg_turmoil.042
	title = dg_turmoil.042.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.042.d
	picture = all_victory
	
	is_triggered_only = yes #on_action
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.042.a
		remove_province_modifier = heretic_bastion
		#if = {
		#	limit = { owner = { has_country_modifier = decreased_morale } }
			remove_country_modifier = decreased_morale
		#}
		owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = morale_boost duration = 400 } }
	}
}

province_event = { #$COUNTRY_RELIGION$ bastion falls
	
	id = dg_turmoil.043
	title = dg_turmoil.043.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.043.d
	picture = turmoil_holy_war
	
	trigger = {
		has_province_flag = church_bastion
		OR = {
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = church_bastion }
			AND = {
				NOT = { controlled_by = owner }
				NOT = { controller = { religion = ROOT } }
			}
		}
		owner = {
			has_country_flag = religious_civil_war
			any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = church_bastion }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = bastion_fall_notifier }
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.043.a
		remove_province_modifier = church_bastion
		#if = {
		#	limit = { owner = { has_country_modifier = morale_boost } }
			remove_country_modifier = morale_boost
		#}
		owner = {
			set_country_flag = bastion_fall_notifier
			add_country_modifier = { name = decreased_morale duration = 400 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Opposition crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.044
	title = dg_turmoil.044.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.044.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_civil_war
		NOT = { has_country_flag = rebels_won_civil_war }
		any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = church_bastion }
		any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = heretic_bastion }
		any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = church_bastion }
		NOT = {
			any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = heretic_bastion }
			any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = church_bastion NOT = { has_province_modifier = church_bastion } }
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }
	
	immediate = {
		end_disaster = religious_civil_war
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				clr_province_flag = heretic_bastion
				clr_province_flag = church_bastion
				remove_province_modifier = church_bastion
				remove_province_modifier = heretic_bastion
			}
			clr_country_flag = religious_civil_war
			clr_country_flag = internal_crusade
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.044.a #Show mercy
		ai_chance = { factor = 50 }
		add_prestige = 20
		if = {
			limit = { stability = 0 NOT = { stability = 1 } }
			add_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { stability = 0 } }
			add_stability_2 = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_catholic }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 2 } }
					change_variable = { which = catholic value = -2 }
					change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_protestant }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = protestant value = 2 } }
					change_variable = { which = protestant value = -2 }
					change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_reformed }
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 2 } }
					change_variable = { which = reformed value = -2 }
					change_variable = { which = converts value = 2 }

			disband_rebels = norse_pagan_reformed_rebels
			hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_norse_pagan_reformed }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_slavic_pagan_reformed }
			disband_rebels = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebels
			hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_slavic_pagan_reformed }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_finnish_pagan_reformed }
			disband_rebels = finnish_pagan_reformed_rebels
			hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_finnish_pagan_reformed }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_baltic_pagan_reformed }
			disband_rebels = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebels
			hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_turmoil_baltic_pagan_reformed }
		}
		hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = bastion_fall_notifier }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.045.a #We have won!
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { stability = 0 } }
			add_stability_1 = yes
		}
		add_prestige = 10
	}
}

country_event = { #Religious exhaustion
	
	id = dg_turmoil.046
	title = dg_turmoil.046.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.046.d

		has_country_flag = religious_civil_war
		NOT = { has_country_flag = rebels_won_civil_war }

			AND = {
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = church_bastion } }
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = heretic_bastion } }
			}
			has_country_flag = religious_civil_war_intermission

	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.046.b #Forge a lasting compromise
		add_prestige = -20
		if = {
			limit = { stability = 0 NOT = { stability = 1 } }
			add_stability_1 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { stability = 0 } }
			add_stability_2 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = inquisition value = 1 } }
			hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = inquisition value = -1 } }
			custom_tooltip = inquisition_weakened
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = edict_of_tolerance duration = -1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Disdvantageous peace
	
	id = dg_turmoil.047

		has_country_flag = religious_civil_war
		NOT = { has_country_flag = rebels_won_civil_war }

		any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = church_bastion }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = church_bastion } }

					has_province_flag = heretic_bastion

country_event = { #Opposition victorious

	title = dg_turmoil.048.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.048.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_civil_war
		OR = {
			any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = heretic_bastion }
			has_country_flag = rebels_won_civil_war
		}
		any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = heretic_bastion }
		any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = church_bastion }
		NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_modifier = church_bastion } }
		OR = {
			NOT = { any_owned_province = { has_province_flag = heretic_bastion NOT = { has_province_modifier = heretic_bastion } } }

		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }
	
	immediate = {
		end_disaster = religious_civil_war
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = war_of_religion_lost
			every_owned_province = {
				clr_province_flag = heretic_bastion
				clr_province_flag = church_bastion

country_event = { #Assassination of heretic
	
	id = dg_turmoil.051
	title = dg_turmoil.051.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.051.d
	picture = protestant_massacre
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		NOT = { religious_unity = 0.70 }
		religion_group = christian
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		is_at_war = no
		NOT = { war_exhaustion = 2 }
		army_size_percentage = 0.50
		manpower_percentage = 0.50
		NOT = { has_country_flag = assassination_of_heretic }
		NOT = { ADM = 3 }
		NOT = { MIL = 3 }
		NOT = { DIP = 3 }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 40
		
		modifier = {
			NOT = { ADM = 2 DIP = 2 MIL = 2 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			NOT = { ADM = 1 DIP = 1 MIL = 1 }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			army_size_percentage = 0.75
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			army_size_percentage = 1.00
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			manpower_percentage = 0.75
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			manpower_percentage = 1.00
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			advisor = inquisitor
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			OR = { #Checks toleration of heretics, since one of these is guaranteed to be a Christian heresy
				NOT = { catholic = 1 }
				NOT = { protestant = 1 }
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			OR = { #Checks toleration of heretics, since one of these is guaranteed to be a Christian heresy
				NOT = { catholic = 0 }
				NOT = { protestant = 0 }
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			OR = { #Checks toleration of heretics, since one of these is guaranteed to be a Christian heresy
				NOT = { catholic = -1 }
				NOT = { protestant = -1 }
			}
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			OR = { #Checks toleration of heretics, since one of these is guaranteed to be a Christian heresy
				NOT = { catholic = -2 }
				NOT = { protestant = -2 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	
	immediate = {
		subtract_stability_1 = yes
		capital_scope = {
			change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 4 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 1825 }
		}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = assassination_of_heretic #Can only fire once per country
			set_country_flag = religious_persecution
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = religious_persecution }
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = catholic }
						check_variable = { which = catholic_population value = 50 }
					}
					set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_catholic
					set_country_flag = religious_civil_war
					clr_country_flag = religious_persecution
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = protestant }
						check_variable = { which = protestant_population value = 50 }
					}
					set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_protestant
					set_country_flag = religious_civil_war
					clr_country_flag = religious_persecution
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = reformed }
						check_variable = { which = reformed_population value = 50 }
					}
					set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_reformed
					set_country_flag = religious_civil_war
					clr_country_flag = religious_persecution
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = orthodox }
						check_variable = { which = orthodox_population value = 50 }
					}
					set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_orthodox
					set_country_flag = religious_civil_war
					clr_country_flag = religious_persecution
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = coptic }
						check_variable = { which = coptic_population value = 50 }
					}
					set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_coptic
					set_country_flag = religious_civil_war
					clr_country_flag = religious_persecution
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = chaldean }
						check_variable = { which = chaldean_population value = 50 }
					}
					set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_chaldean
					set_country_flag = religious_civil_war
					clr_country_flag = religious_persecution
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = gnostic }
						check_variable = { which = gnostic_population value = 50 }
					}
					set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_gnostic
					set_country_flag = religious_civil_war
					clr_country_flag = religious_persecution
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {

country_event = { #The failure of tolerance
	
	id = dg_turmoil.052
	title = dg_turmoil.052.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.052.d
	picture = turmoil_pogrom
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = edict_of_tolerance
		NOT = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
		religion_group = christian
		is_at_war = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_catholic }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_protestant }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_reformed }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_orthodox }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_coptic }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_chaldean }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_gnostic }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hussite }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = edict_of_tolerance } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.052.a #Issue a new edict
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 10
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 15
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 20
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { manpower_percentage = 0.50 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = 0 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { stability = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				stability = 1
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				stability = 2
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				stability = 3
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				manpower_percentage = 0.75
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { war_exhaustion = 5 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				piety = 0.20
				factor = 0.5
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { piety = -0.20 }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { piety = -0.60 }
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = toleration_policy_failed
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = edict_of_tolerance duration = -1 }
		add_adm_power = -50
		add_prestige = -5
		add_legitimacy = -5
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.052.b #Give up on the policy of toleration
		ai_chance = { factor = 50 }
		hidden_effect = { set_country_flag = toleration_policy_failed }
	}
}

country_event = { #Religious Favoritism
	
	id = dg_turmoil.054
	title = dg_turmoil.054.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.054.d
	picture = catholic_court
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { religion = catholic }
				catholic = 3
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { religion = protestant }
				protestant = 3
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { religion = reformed }
				reformed = 3
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { religion = gnostic }
				gnostic = 3
			}

	}

					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_protestant
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = reformed }
						any_owned_province = { religion = reformed }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_reformed
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = heresy_chosen } }
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = chaldean }
						any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = chaldean value = 6 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_chaldean
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = coptic }
						any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = coptic value = 6 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_coptic
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = orthodox }
						any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = orthodox value = 6 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_orthodox
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = catholic }
						any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = catholic value = 6 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_catholic
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = gnostic }
						any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = gnostic value = 6 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_gnostic
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = hussite }
						any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = hussite value = 6 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_hussite
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = protestant }
						any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = protestant value = 6 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_protestant
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { religion = reformed }
						any_owned_province = { check_variable = { which = reformed value = 6 } }
					}
					set_country_flag = heresy_chosen
					set_country_flag = heresy_reformed
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.054.a #It is time to stop flirting with heresy
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = heresy_strong
				factor = 0.5
			}
		}
		remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = heresy_chosen
			clr_country_flag = heresy_strong
			clr_country_flag = heresy_moderate
			clr_country_flag = heresy_coptic
			clr_country_flag = heresy_chaldean
			clr_country_flag = heresy_orthodox
			clr_country_flag = heresy_catholic
			clr_country_flag = heresy_gnostic
			clr_country_flag = heresy_hussite
			clr_country_flag = heresy_protestant
			clr_country_flag = heresy_reformed
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.054.b #Openly break with the $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ religion
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = heresy_strong
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = heresy_moderate
				factor = 2
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = heresy_coptic
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { religion = coptic culture_group = owner is_city = yes } }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = heresy_orthodox
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { religion = orthodox culture_group = owner is_city = yes } }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = heresy_gnostic
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { religion = gnostic culture_group = owner is_city = yes } }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {

				factor = 0
			}

				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = heresy_reformed
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { religion = reformed culture_group = owner is_city = yes } }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		trigger = { any_owned_province = { religion_group = christian NOT = { religion = ROOT } } }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = heresy_coptic }
			change_religion = coptic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = heresy_chaldean }
			change_religion = chaldean
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = heresy_orthodox }
			change_religion = orthodox
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = heresy_catholic }
			change_religion = catholic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = heresy_gnostic }
			change_religion = gnostic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = heresy_hussite }
			change_religion = hussite
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = heresy_protestant }
			change_religion = protestant
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = heresy_reformed }
			change_religion = reformed
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = heresy_chosen

			clr_country_flag = heresy_coptic

province_event = { #Heresy ends peacefully
	
	id = dg_turmoil.061
	title = dg_turmoil.061.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.061.d
	picture = RELIGIOUS_CONVERSION_eventPicture
	
	trigger = {
		has_owner_religion = no
		tolerance_to_this = 0
		NOT = { any_neighbor_province = { religion = ROOT } } #The religion of the province
		owner = {
			religion_group = ROOT
			stability = 1
			NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		}
		is_core = owner
		controlled_by = owner
		has_siege = no
		any_neighbor_province = {
			has_owner_religion = yes
			owned_by = ROOT
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics }
		}
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = expulsion_of_heretics }
		NOT = { has_province_modifier = absentee_bishop }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		
		years = 100
		
		modifier = {
			has_province_modifier = effective_bishop
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_province_modifier = jesuit_activity
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_province_modifier = dominican_order
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			has_province_modifier = franciscan_order
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			factor = 1.4
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.061.a #Wonderful!
		hidden_effect = { change_variable = { which = converted_heretics value = 4 } }
	}
}

		has_owner_religion = no

		is_city = yes

		tolerance_to_this = -2
		any_owned_province = {

		}

		}

			NOT = { tolerance_to_this = -1 }

		}

			factor = 1.4
		}

			owner = { stability = 2 }
			factor = 1.4

		}

			owner = { NOT = { stability = -1 } }
			factor = 0.7
		}

			owner = { NOT = { stability = -2 } }
			factor = 0.7
		}
		modifier = {

			factor = 0.7
		}

			owner = { piety = 0.20 }
			factor = 0.7
		}

			owner = { NOT = { piety = -0.20 } }
			factor = 1.4
		}
		modifier = {
			owner = { NOT = { piety = -0.60 } }
			factor = 1.4
		}

country_event = { #Pogrom against the $COUNTRY_RELIGION$ faith
	
	id = dg_turmoil.065
	title = dg_turmoil.065.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.065.d
	picture = catholic_burning_church
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.065.a #They will burn for this!
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					piety = 0.60
					AND = {
						piety = 0.20
						OR = {
							is_neighbor_of = FROM
							alliance_with = FROM
							marriage_with = FROM
							junior_union_with = FROM
							senior_union_with = FROM
							truce_with = FROM
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_fanatical }
			add_casus_belli = { target = FROM months = 24 type = cb_holy_war_vengeance }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						piety = 0.20
						NOT = { piety = 0.60 }
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_neighbor_of = FROM
								alliance_with = FROM
								marriage_with = FROM
								junior_union_with = FROM
								senior_union_with = FROM
								truce_with = FROM
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						piety = -0.20
						NOT = { piety = 0.20 }
						OR = {
							is_neighbor_of = FROM
							alliance_with = FROM
							marriage_with = FROM
							junior_union_with = FROM
							senior_union_with = FROM
							truce_with = FROM
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_pious }
			add_casus_belli = { target = FROM months = 12 type = cb_holy_war_vengeance }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						piety = -0.20
						NOT = { piety = 0.20 }
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_neighbor_of = FROM
								alliance_with = FROM
								marriage_with = FROM
								junior_union_with = FROM
								senior_union_with = FROM
								truce_with = FROM
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						piety = -0.60
						NOT = { piety = -0.20 }
						OR = {
							is_neighbor_of = FROM
							alliance_with = FROM
							marriage_with = FROM
							junior_union_with = FROM
							senior_union_with = FROM
							truce_with = FROM
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_observant }
			add_casus_belli = { target = FROM months = 6 type = cb_holy_war_vengeance }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						piety = -0.60
						NOT = { piety = -0.20 }
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_neighbor_of = FROM
								alliance_with = FROM
								marriage_with = FROM
								junior_union_with = FROM
								senior_union_with = FROM
								truce_with = FROM
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						NOT = { piety = -0.60 }
						OR = {
							is_neighbor_of = FROM
							alliance_with = FROM
							marriage_with = FROM
							junior_union_with = FROM
							senior_union_with = FROM
							truce_with = FROM
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_decadent }
			add_casus_belli = { target = FROM months = 3 type = cb_holy_war_vengeance }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { piety = -0.60 }
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						is_neighbor_of = FROM
						alliance_with = FROM
						marriage_with = FROM
						junior_union_with = FROM
						senior_union_with = FROM
						truce_with = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = mistreated_coreligionists_decadent }
		}
	}
}

		}
		add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = religious_scandal_decadent }
	}
}

		is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger = yes
		overlord = {
			NOT = { religion = ROOT }
			check_variable = { which = sympathy_to_old_religion value = 1 }

		}

		}

country_event = { #Disloyal Vassals
	
	id = dg_turmoil.073
	title = dg_turmoil.073.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.073.d
	picture = all_massacre
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.073.a #We shall force them to convert
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				is_at_war = yes
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 5
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 10
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 15
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 20
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_religious_independence
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.073.b #Give them our oath that they may keep their faith
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = { FROM = { set_country_flag = oath_of_tolerance } }
	}
}

			limit = { overlord = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed } }

			change_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
	}

country_event = { #Heretical Vassals
	
	id = dg_turmoil.075
	title = dg_turmoil.075.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.075.d
	picture = all_massacre
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.075.a #We shall force them to convert
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				is_at_war = yes
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 5
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 10
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 15
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				war_exhaustion = 20
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_religious_independence
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.075.b #Give them our oath that they may keep their faith
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = { FROM = { set_country_flag = oath_of_tolerance } }
	}
}

#steve1
country_event = { #Missionaries Expelled
	
	id = dg_turmoil.278
	title = dg_turmoil.078.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.078.d
	picture = all_reply_insult
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { is_subject_of = ROOT liberty_desire = 50 } }
			custom_tooltip = independence_war_result
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.078.a #Send them back with an army
		ai_chance = { factor = 60 }
		add_manpower = -1
		FROM = { country_event = { id = dg_turmoil.280 days = 100 } }
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.078.b #Let it go
		ai_chance = { factor = 40 }
		dg_reduce_legitimacy_large = yes
		dg_reduce_prestige = yes
	}
}

		}

		reverse_add_casus_belli = { target = FROM type = cb_holy_war_vengeance months = 60 }
		reverse_add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = executed_missionaries }
	}
}

province_event = { #Foreign missionaries on our soil
	
	id = dg_turmoil.077
	title = dg_turmoil.077.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.077.d
	picture = all_foreign_missionaries
	
	is_triggered_only = yes #By decision
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.077.a #Execute them
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		remove_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
		owner = {
			reverse_add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = executed_missionaries }
			FROM = { country_event = { id = dg_turmoil.079 days = 200 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.077.b #Expel them
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		random = {
			chance = 50
			remove_province_modifier = heretic_missionary
		}
		owner = {
			reverse_add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = banished_missionaries }
			FROM = { country_event = { id = dg_turmoil.078 days = 100 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.077.c #Send our own missionaries to counter their influence
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		add_province_modifier = { name = missionary_obstruction duration = 1000 }
		owner = {
			reverse_add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = showing_intolerance }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.077.e #Ignore their trespass
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		owner = {
			if = {
				limit = { piety = 0.60 }
				add_prestige = -8
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { piety = 0.20 }
				add_prestige = -6
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { piety = -0.20 }
				add_prestige = -4
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { piety = -0.60 }
				add_prestige = -2
			}
			reverse_add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = showing_limited_tolerance }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.076.b #Encourage people to listen to them
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		trigger = { is_capital = yes }
		owner = {
			reverse_add_opinion = { who = FROM modifier = showing_tolerance }
			if = {
				limit = { piety = 0.60 }
				add_prestige = -8
				add_legitimacy = -8
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { piety = 0.20 }
				add_prestige = -6
				add_legitimacy = -6
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { piety = -0.20 }
				add_prestige = -4
				add_legitimacy = -4
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { piety = -0.60 }
				add_prestige = -2
				add_legitimacy = -2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Catholic Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.101
	title = dg_turmoil.101.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = catholic_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_catholic }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = catholic }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			catholic = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				catholic = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				catholic = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				catholic = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_catholic
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_catholic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2

			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { catholic = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25

				NOT = { catholic = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { catholic = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}

					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}

		}

					has_province_flag = catholic_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}

		}

					value = 1
				}

country_event = { #protestant Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.102
	title = dg_turmoil.102.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = protestant_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_protestant }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = protestant }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			protestant = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				protestant = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				protestant = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				protestant = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_protestant
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_protestant
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = protestant_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12

		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_reformed
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = reformed_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #hussite Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.104
	title = dg_turmoil.104.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = hussite_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hussite }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = hussite }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			hussite = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				hussite = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				hussite = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				hussite = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_hussite
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_hussite
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 2

					value = 1

			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { hussite = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { hussite = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { hussite = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}

		if = {

				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}

					has_province_flag = hussite_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}

		NOT = { religion = orthodox }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			orthodox = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				orthodox = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				orthodox = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				orthodox = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_orthodox
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_orthodox
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { orthodox = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { orthodox = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { orthodox = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { orthodox = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_orthodox
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = orthodox_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}
}

			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {

				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}

			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}

		}
		else_if = {

				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { sunni = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sunni = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sunni = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { sunni = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}

		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {

					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}

			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}

					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = sunni_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}

		}
	}

country_event = { #shiite Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.109
	title = dg_turmoil.109.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = shiite_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_shiite }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = shiite }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			shiite = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				shiite = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				shiite = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				shiite = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_shiite
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_shiite
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {

				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shiite_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2

				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { ibadi = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ibadi = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ibadi = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { ibadi = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_ibadi
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = ibadi_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}

country_event = { #wahhabi Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.111
	title = dg_turmoil.111.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = wahhabi_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_wahhabi }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = wahhabi }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			wahhabi = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				wahhabi = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				wahhabi = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				wahhabi = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_wahhabi
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_wahhabi
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8

					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6

		}
		else_if = {

					has_province_flag = wahhabi_rebel_victory

					value = 1

			}

		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hinduism_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hinduism_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hinduism_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hinduism
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = hinduism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = hinduism_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}
