country_event = { #jain Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.113
	title = dg_turmoil.113.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = jain_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_jain }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = jain }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			jain = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				jain = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				jain = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				jain = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_jain
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_jain
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { jain = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { jain = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { jain = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { jain = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}

			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance

		add_piety = 0.20

		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}

			limit = {

					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}

		}

					has_province_flag = jain_rebel_victory

			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = zoroastrian_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = zoroastrian_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}

		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = zoroastrian_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = zoroastrian_rebel_victory }

			modifier = {

			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {

				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {

					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 5

			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {

				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 4

			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {

					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory

				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { confucianism = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { confucianism = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { confucianism = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { confucianism = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2

		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}

			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20

					value = 3
				}

		}
		else_if = {

					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {

					has_province_flag = confucianism_rebel_victory

				}

country_event = { #buddhism Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.118
	title = dg_turmoil.118.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = buddhism_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = buddhism_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_buddhism }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = buddhism }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			buddhism = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				buddhism = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				buddhism = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				buddhism = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_buddhism
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_buddhism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = buddhism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = buddhism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = buddhism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = buddhism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = buddhism_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = buddhism_rebel_victory

				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18

				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { mahayana = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mahayana = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mahayana = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mahayana = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_mahayana
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = mahayana_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #vajrayana Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.120
	title = dg_turmoil.120.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = vajrayana_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_vajrayana }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = vajrayana }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			vajrayana = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				vajrayana = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				vajrayana = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				vajrayana = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_vajrayana
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_vajrayana
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {

			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = vajrayana_rebel_victory }

				NOT = { vajrayana = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { vajrayana = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}

				factor = 0.7
			}

				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jewish_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = jewish_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_jewish
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = jewish_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = jewish_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}

country_event = { #nahuatl Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.122
	title = dg_turmoil.122.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = nahuatl_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_nahuatl }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = nahuatl }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			nahuatl = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				nahuatl = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				nahuatl = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				nahuatl = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_nahuatl
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_nahuatl
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = nahuatl_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {

			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = totemism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = totemism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = totemism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = totemism_rebel_victory }

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4

			add_manpower = 2
		}

				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = totemism_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {

		else_if = {

			add_treasury = 6

		else_if = {

		}

			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = totemism_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { totemism = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { totemism = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { totemism = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { totemism = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0

				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }

				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}

		}

		#}

		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory

		}

			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { polynesian_religion = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { polynesian_religion = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { polynesian_religion = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { polynesian_religion = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_polynesian_religion
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = polynesian_religion_rebel_victory }

			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}

country_event = { #shamanism Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.127
	title = dg_turmoil.127.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = shamanism_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_shamanism }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = shamanism }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			shamanism = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				shamanism = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				shamanism = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				shamanism = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_shamanism
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_shamanism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {

					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {

			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = shamanism_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }

				NOT = { shamanism = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { shamanism = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}

		if = {

				}

			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { animism = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { animism = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { animism = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { animism = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = animism_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = animism_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = animism_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = animism_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = animism_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_animism
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = animism_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = animism_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}

country_event = { #hellenic_pagan Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.129
	title = dg_turmoil.129.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = hellenic_pagan_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_hellenic_pagan }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			hellenic_pagan = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				hellenic_pagan = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				hellenic_pagan = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				hellenic_pagan = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_hellenic_pagan
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_hellenic_pagan
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = hellenic_pagan_rebel_victory

			add_treasury = 8

		else_if = {

					has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_norse_pagan_reformed
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = norse_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 2190 }
			add_province_modifier = { name = expulsion_of_heretics duration = 1500 }
		}
	}

country_event = { #slavic_pagan_reformed Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.131
	title = dg_turmoil.131.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_slavic_pagan_reformed }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			slavic_pagan_reformed = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				slavic_pagan_reformed = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				slavic_pagan_reformed = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				slavic_pagan_reformed = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_slavic_pagan_reformed
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { slavic_pagan_reformed = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { slavic_pagan_reformed = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { slavic_pagan_reformed = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { slavic_pagan_reformed = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_tolerance
			add_piety = 0.20
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_intolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = 0.20
		add_war_exhaustion = 2
		#if = {
		#	limit = { has_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = edict_of_tolerance
		#}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -25
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -20
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = slavic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_adm_power = -5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_happening
			set_country_flag = religious_turmoil_slavic_pagan_reformed

country_event = { #baltic_pagan_reformed Rebellion crushed
	
	id = dg_turmoil.133
	title = dg_turmoil.133.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_baltic_pagan_reformed }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }
	
	immediate = { hidden_effect = { clr_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory } }
	
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.a #Rethink our policies
		trigger = {
			baltic_pagan_reformed = 0
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				baltic_pagan_reformed = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				baltic_pagan_reformed = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				baltic_pagan_reformed = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_baltic_pagan_reformed
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_baltic_pagan_reformed
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = baltic_pagan_reformed_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { baltic_pagan_reformed = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { baltic_pagan_reformed = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { baltic_pagan_reformed = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { baltic_pagan_reformed = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0

			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}

				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}

		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				chaldean = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				chaldean = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				chaldean = 3
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				has_country_flag = was_chaldean
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { which = minority_usefulness value = 30 }
			set_country_flag = useful_chaldean
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = religious_intolerance }
			remove_country_modifier = religious_intolerance
			add_piety = -0.20
		}
		if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.60 }
			add_prestige = -4
			add_legitimacy = -4
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = 0.20 }
			add_prestige = -3
			add_legitimacy = -3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.20 }
			add_prestige = -2
			add_legitimacy = -2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { piety = -0.60 }
			add_prestige = -1
			add_legitimacy = -1
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = religious_tolerance duration = 2000 }
		add_piety = -0.20
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_3
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_autonomy duration = 25000 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.b #Execute rebel leaders but show mercy to communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
		}
		add_legitimacy = 1
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -1 }
				add_base_unrest = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = added_unrest_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.c #Impose a heavy burden on rebel communities
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 1
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				num_of_loans = 2
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				is_bankrupt = yes
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 10
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 20
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 9
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 18
			add_manpower = 3
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 8
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 16
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 7
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 14
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 6
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 12
			add_manpower = 2
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 5
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 10
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 4
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 8
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				num_of_owned_provinces_with = {
					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 3
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 6
			add_manpower = 1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {

					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 2
				}

		else_if = {

					has_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory
					value = 1
				}
			}
			add_treasury = 2
		}
		every_owned_province = {

			hidden_effect = { clr_province_flag = chaldean_rebel_victory }
			add_province_modifier = { name = religious_unrest duration = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = dg_turmoil.101.e #Deport rebel communities from $COUNTRY$
		trigger = {
			NOT = { chaldean = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = religious_tolerance }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { chaldean = -1 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { chaldean = -2 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { chaldean = -3 }
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { mil_power = 25 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.80 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.60 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.40 }
				factor = 0.7
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { religious_unity = 0.20 }
				factor = 0
			}

	title = dg_turmoil.138.t
	desc = dg_turmoil.101.d
	picture = all_rebels_crushed
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = religious_rebel_victory
		any_owned_province = {
			has_province_flag = shinto_rebel_victory
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = religious_autonomy }
		}
		NOT = { has_spawned_rebels = shinto_rebels }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_turmoil_shinto }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = religious_civil_war }
		NOT = { religion = shinto }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 1 }

			factor = 25
			modifier = {

			}

			}

				set_variable = { which = added_unrest value = -3 }
